Class EReaderModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • EReaderModel

  • public class EReaderModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for EReader, controls underlying structure for implementation.
    Author:
    Ali Hamza, Sultan Alnhari

      • readBook

        public void readBook(java.lang.String bookName)
        Opens a new book, adds it to the Library, and sets the new book to be current.
        Parameters:
        bookName, - new name of book or path to book.

      • openBook

        public void openBook(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method is used to interact with the current displayed book in the library and turn its current page to the first one.
        Parameters:
        fileName, - represents the book to open.

      • getProgress

        public double getProgress()
        Getter method for the current book's progress (for progress bar).
        Returns:
        double value in range of 0.0-1.0 that represents overall progress

      • bookNotFounds

        public boolean bookNotFounds()
        Returns:
        return true if the book is spelled wrong and not valid.

      • Library

        public void Library(java.lang.String name,
                    Book book)
        Adds a new book to the library for this class. Uses the name of the book as a key and Book itself as value.
        Parameters:
        name, - String name of book to add.
        book, - Book object of book to add.

      • getBook

        public Book getBook(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the Book object that name represents.
        Parameters:
        name, - String name of Book to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Book object matching name

      • getLines

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLines(java.lang.String name)
        Gets an ArrayList of all words in a Book specified by name.
        Parameters:
        name, - String name of book to find.
        Returns:
        complete ArrayList of all words in the book.

      • getLibrary

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Book> getLibrary()
        Returns the entire Library of books for the Model.
        Returns:
        HashMap representation of all Books in the library.

      • getNextPage

        public void getNextPage()
        This method is used to interact with the current displayed book in the library and turn its current page to the next one.

      • getPrevPage

        public void getPrevPage()
        This method is used to interact with the current displayed book in the library and turn its current page to the previous one.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String fileName)
        Checks if a book is contained in the library model.
        Parameters:
        fileName, - represents the file name of the book.
        Returns:
        returns true if book is contained in library and false if not.
